upgradeNotice.title: Our Website Is Being Upgraded. Exciting Updates in Progress.
upgradeNotice.body: Immigration Consultations and Complete Services Continue with Excellence as Normal. While our website is being redesigned to better serve our clients, our legal services continue without interruption. If you require assistance with visas, residency, or immigration strategy, please contact us directly. We respond to all enquiries within 24 hours.

serviceCards.title: Visa Strategy and Eligibility
serviceCards.description: Profile-led visa mapping for work, investor, digital nomad, family, retirement, and special categories.

serviceCards.title: Residency Application Execution
serviceCards.description: End-to-end management of submissions, supporting records, sworn translations, and procedural follow-through.

serviceCards.title: Post-Arrival Integration
serviceCards.description: Operational setup for CPF, CRNM/RNE, housing, schooling, banking, and local onboarding pathways.

processSteps.title: Strategy Intake
processSteps.description: We audit profile, goals, timeline, and dependencies to define the legally viable immigration path.

processSteps.title: Document Architecture
processSteps.description: All required records are mapped with source authority, translation status, and validity windows.

processSteps.title: Submission and Tracking
processSteps.description: Applications are filed with structured QA and status tracking until adjudication milestones.

processSteps.title: Arrival and Stabilization
processSteps.description: Post-approval support covers registration, practical setup, and continuity planning.
